FAQ.q1: How can I book a cleaning service?
FAQ.a1: You can place an order through the form on our website or contact us via phone or WhatsApp. You can also visit our office at the address listed below for more details.
FAQ.q2: Do I need to be at home during the cleaning?
FAQ.a2: No, you can leave the keys or provide access in advance. Many clients prefer cleaning to be done in their absence. Our staff is fully responsible for the safety of your property.
FAQ.q3: What cleaning products do you use?
FAQ.a3: We use professional, eco-friendly, and safe products suitable for children and pets. We have never received complaints about health issues after our cleanings.
FAQ.a4: The price depends on the service type and the size of your space. A minimum cost is calculated automatically. After submitting a request, our manager will contact you to clarify the cleaning conditions. The final cost may be higher depending on complexity.
FAQ.q5: Do you bring your own equipment?
FAQ.a5: Yes, our team arrives fully equipped with professional tools. We select and bring all necessary equipment and cleaning products based on your cleaning needs.
FAQ.q6: How long does the cleaning take?
FAQ.a6: The duration depends on the service type and the size of the space. Typically, cleaning takes from 1 to 4 hours.
FAQ.q7: Do you offer discounts or promotions?
FAQ.a7: Yes, we have a loyalty program. Regular customers and clients who schedule recurring cleanings receive a discount per square meter.
FAQ.q8: Can I cancel or reschedule the cleaning?
FAQ.a8: Yes, cancellation or rescheduling is free if done at least 24 hours in advance. If you cancel later than 24 hours before the appointment, the payment is non-refundable.
